Title: Relates to the disqualification of certain persons from acting as school bus monitors and drivers
Summary: Relates to the disqualification of certain persons from acting as school bus monitors and drivers upon the conviction for certain offenses.
LawCode: Add ยง3635-d, Ed L; amd ยง509-cc, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to disqualification of persons employed as school bus monitors and bus drivers
